title: Plansey – Your Wedding Planning
description: Plan your dream wedding with Plansey. Find vendors, manage guests, budget and tasks.

hero.headline: Plan Your Dream Wedding
hero.subheadline: Everything you need – tasks, budget, guests and the best vendors near you.

checklist.title: Checklist & Tasks
checklist.description: Stay on top of everything with our smart task list – from planning to the big day.

budget.title: Budget Management
budget.description: Plan your budget and track costs – planned vs. actual.

guests.title: Guest List & RSVP
guests.description: Manage your guests, send RSVP links and plan the seating chart.

vendors.title: Find Vendors
vendors.description: Discover photographers, florists, venues and more near you.
